titles.title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code to make nondischargeable debts for personal injuries that result in permanent disability.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary:
2/14/2008--Introduced.
Amends federal bankruptcy law to declare nondischargeable in bankruptcy any debts for a personal injury that results in a permanent disability.
